scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:prepare && npm run build && npm run deploy:push && npm run deploy:cleanup
scripts.deploy:prepare: if [ -d "dist" ]; then git worktree remove dist; fi && git worktree add dist gh-pages
scripts.deploy:push: cd dist && git pull origin gh-pages && git add --all && git commit --no-verify -m "Deploy updates" && git push origin gh-pages
